sentences.english: The carcass performance and meat qualities of different hybridized combination finishing pigs was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同雜交組合育肥豬胴體品質和肉質特性。

sentences.english: In the daylight I examined her perfect body inch by inch.
sentences.chinese: 日光下，我一寸一寸地打量着她那完美的胴體。

sentences.english: The effects of diet nutrition level on pig carcass composition were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 本文就日糧營養水平對豬胴體品質的影響作一綜述。

sentences.english: Effect of cysteamine on performance and carcass quality of finishing pigs;
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同雜交組合育肥豬胴體品質和肉質特性。

sentences.english: Youthful carcasses will have cartilaginous caps on the thoracic vertebrae.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的胴體在胸椎骨上有軟骨蓋。

sentences.english: Second, performance-related and forecast of carcass production rate are studied.
sentences.chinese: 胴體產肉率的相關性進行分析並對其進行預測。

sentences.english: Sartorial techniques insist on the beauty of a geometrically measurable body.
sentences.chinese: 裁剪技術依賴於經過幾何測量的美麗胴體。

definition: to return something to its rightful owner
to have no sense of shame/brazen
to like looking attractive (usually of girls)/aestheticism
to make a concession/to be accommodating
in high spirits (idiom); glowing with health and vigor
see 眾星捧月|众星捧月[zhong4 xing1 peng3 yue4]
in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
